ygData.subject: Re: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: Here you go, the ultimate party, around lvl 40+ 1- Monk 2- Monk 3- Monk 4- Enchanter 5- Druid 6- Cleric With fbss and the enchanter s celerity (39) or swift
ygData.messageBody:
Here you go, the ultimate party, around lvl 40+

1- Monk
2- Monk
3- Monk
4- Enchanter
5- Druid
6- Cleric

With fbss and the enchanter's celerity (39) or swift like wind (49) the monks
can dish an AMAZING amount of dmg. Enchanter can slow down mobs, and give
all 3 caster types mana faster. Cleric heals and buffs. Druids have some
nice DD and DOTS, snare and back up heal. If you can think of a better group
plz tell me cause I don't think there is. No resisting and don't need a
taunt as the casters more than likely aren't gonna get jumped. Not to
mention, if one of the monks is getting beaten too badly, FD and mob will
jump to another of them. If you have ever seen this kind of group in action,
I'm sure you'll agree with me.

Kanja
Rodcet Nife
